data.text: @ruthhill74 You know me so well, Ruth. Of course I would totally blow that secret. xoxo
@ruthhill74 @TeriWilsonauthr Sounds like inspiration, no? On second thought Teri, stay here and write what would have happened. You will still need to do field research.
@TeriWilsonauthr I think you should give it a go. Just so long as you keep writing the good stuff. :)
@TeriWilsonauthr If anyone could do it, Teri, you could. Except, would you really be able to keep it under your tiara that you're their "ghost-tweeter"?
